# 归并排序模板


```cpp

static const int N = 100010;
int temp[N];
void mergesort(vector<int>&nums, int l, int r){
    if(l >= r)return;
    int mid = l + r>>1;
    int i = l, j = mid + 1, k = 0;

    while(i<=mid && j<=r){
        if(nums[i]<= nums[j])temp[k++] = nums[i++];
        else temp[k++] = nums[j++];
    }
    while(i<=mid)temp[k++] = nums[i++];
    while(j<=r) temp[k++] = nums[j++]; 
    for(int i = l, k = 0; i<=r;i++,k++){
        nums[i] = temp[k];
    }
}



```
